Entries.AcceptGift_(O)119: This makes you wonder... Thousands of years ago, there was probably a young purple-haired cavedragon who played this flute, just like me.#$b#...I'll have to wash it before pressing it to my muzzle, though.$h
Entries.Resort_Umbrella: My underbelly gets burnt really easily. So I'm just gonna stay under this umbrella for a while.#$e#I like it in the shade. Too much sun makes me dizzy.
Entries.summer_Thu10: Wow, you look nice today.#$e#I mean, that summer air is really good for the scales, isn't it?... heh...$l
Entries.summer_Thu4: Ew, this heat makes me wish I lived in a cave.$s
Entries.fall_Thu: #$1 AbigailHAND#Last night I dreamt that my left claw had turned into a gigantic %noun. Does that mean anything?#$e#%Abigail doesn't seem to be interested in talking right now.
Entries.fall_Fri6: I wish the season lasted a little longer.$8#$e#When the wind really picks up, I almost feel like a hatchling again.
Entries.winter_7: I'm looking forward to making a snow dragon tomorrow.

Entries.Sat: My arms are really sore, but that's the sign of progress for a dog like me.#$e#I must've done a thousand push-ups yesterday.
Entries.summer_Tue: If my fur wasn't so popular with the ladies, I swear I'd shave it all off in a second.#$e#*sigh*... Life can be tough.
Entries.summer_Sat: Mmmm... I smell a barbeque.#$e#Damn I wonder if they have any bones for me.
Entries.winter_Sat: There's some weird people living in this town.#$e#...like that wolf Sebastian. Why does he wear black all the time?#$e#I don't get it.

Entries.Sat6: #$1 Caroline12#When we first moved here, I took a while to settle down... I wasn't ready for the domestic life.#$e#Pierre's a bit conventional... but he's an honest raccoon. He's ambitious, but he always puts his family first.
Entries.summer_Tue: I've been smelling wild fruits in the forest lately.#$e#Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.
Entries.fall_Wed6: You know, I used to want to be a farmer myself. Well, more like a rancher.#$e#I always loved movies about the wild west when I was a kit.

Entries.Resort_Chair: Ow... even under my fur I'm burnt to a crisp.$s
Entries.Wed6: Oh, hi @. Sorry if my fur is a little messy. I've been working at the furnace all morning.$h#$e#So, did you need anything, or do you just want to visit?
Entries.Fri8: I should save up and buy a computer...#$e#Maybe I can find a boyfriend on the 'internet'...$s#$e#What? Don't judge me! Not everyone is a cool, attractive, socially-adept farmer, you know!$u#$e#What's a panda like me supposed to do? *Groan*$s
Entries.Resort_Shore: Oh no... I forgot to trim my foot claws.$s

Entries.Fri: Robin has a hot temper. It's better to stay on her good side. She bites...#$e#Don't tell her I said that.$h
Entries.Fri4: Robin has a hot temper. It's better to stay on her good side. She bites...#$e#...now if I could only quantify her mood levels, perhaps I could model the fluctuations using a sinusoidal curve...$u
Entries.married_Maru: *sigh*... @, I've come to accept that it's time for my 'kit' to become a grown rabbit. You have my blessing.$s

Entries.Introduction: Hey, you're pretty good at mining, for a surface-dweller.
Entries.firstVisit_IslandNorth: If you enter the volcano on Ginger Island, you might encounter others like me. Don't be alarmed! We're peaceful with surface-dwellers.
Entries.Fri_2: Most surface-dwellers fear the unknown... that's why I've hidden my shop here.#$e#Your mining skills prove you're trustworthy.
Entries.mineArea_121: You know, you're pretty good at mining, for a surface-dweller.

Entries.Fri8: I'll admit... it takes me several hours each morning to make my mane look this good.

Entries.winter_Tue4: I think my feathers are frozen solid...$s
Entries.dating_Emily: %Emily has a big smile on her beak.
